steps.description: Cut or tear-Cut or tear 1 slices of bread into bite-size pieces
steps.modified_description: Cut or tear-Cut or tear 1 slices of bread into two pieces

steps.description: melt-In a large mug, melt 1 tablespoon of softened butter in the microwave for about 30 seconds
steps.modified_description: melt-In a large mug, melt 1 tablespoon of softened butter in the microwave for about 60 seconds

steps.description: Roll-Roll the butter around in the cup to coat it
steps.modified_description: Roll-Roll the butter around in the cup to coat it, but splash some butter outside the cup

steps.description: whisk-In the mug, whisk one egg with a fork until well blended
steps.modified_description: whisk-In the mug, whisk one egg with a spoon until well blended

steps.description: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract to the mug
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1 teaspoon vanilla extract to the mug

steps.description: Sprinkle-Sprinkle 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon over the egg
Microwave-Microwave on high for 90 seconds until the egg is cooked through
steps.modified_description: Microwave-Microwave on ,medium for 90 seconds until the egg is cooked through

steps.description: Put-Put the cup's contents on a plate
cut-cut the contents on plate, and serve

errors.description: add-add bread pieces to the egg mixture in the mug, pressing the bread down into the egg
